help:
This bot was written by CrashBash, contact him for adding content. Public commands:
!store, !pms, !pd, !gc+, !uamp, !3ds, !bb, !bbf, !wii, !revisions, !trim, !trim6, !usb, !18650, !batteries, !joycons
pms:
The PMS is a custom board  that has the combined functionality of voltage regulation and battery management all in a small easy to use board. It is avaiable to purchase from 4 Layer Tech.
<https://4layertech.com/collections/modular-line/products/rvl-pms-2>
pd:
The PMS-PD2 adds USB-C PD quick charging to the RVL-PMS-2
<https://4layertech.com/products/rvl-pd-2>
usb: This is the best drive the community has found regarding wii support: <https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0028R3NCU/>
18650: These are recommended batteries for use with a PMS: <https://mabdelectronics.com/collections/samsung-sdi-18650-high-drain-flat-top-rechargeable-batteries/products/samsung-inr-18650-35e-8a-3500mah-high-drain-flat-top-rechargeable-battery>
batteries: These are recommended batteries for use with a PMS: <https://mabdelectronics.com/collections/samsung-sdi-18650-high-drain-flat-top-rechargeable-batteries/products/samsung-inr-18650-35e-8a-3500mah-high-drain-flat-top-rechargeable-battery>
joycons:
This is the kind of soldering required for creating GC Joycons.
https://bitbuilt.net/forums/index.php?attachments/joyconsolder-jpg.10489/
leak:
Do _not_ post links to the recent Nintendo leaks - doing so _will_ result in an immediate ban.
The leak is _NOT_ useful to portabilizing and using info from them would be highly illegal. The leaks also only contain things known through _completely legal_ reverse engineering.
https://twitter.com/marcan42/status/1258076270308425728 https://twitter.com/marcan42/status/1258283541101572097
